claim: In the U.K., you can protect yourself against claims of copyright infringement by not making any money off the copyrighted work.

supporting.text: In the U.K., copyright law includes a 'fair dealing' exception, which allows limited use of copyrighted material without permission for purposes such as criticism, review, or private study, regardless of commercial gain.
